biotools.summary: Tools to generate automatically high quality sequence by ordering contigs, closing gaps, correcting sequence errors and transferring annotation. With the advent of next generation sequencing a software for mapping or aligning short reads and performing genome assembly was developed.

bioschemas.name: Post Assembly Genome Improvement Toolkit
